6 Things We Face in Preaching the Gospel
description: Rolfe Barnard shares on the sad state of modern day Christianity. Many believe in a 20th century concept of God that cannot defend his church or make the gospel effect in our day. We need to believe in a gospel that can convert and save souls for eternity. He shares 6 things that we face in our modern day when preaching the old gospel.

description: Rolfe Barnard speaks with power and authority against many misconceptions and falsities found in the Church of Jesus Christ. He takes us on a journey to hell with Abraham too see that hell is eternal and everlasting. This sermon will move and impact you for eternity.

Paul's Gospel
description: Where has the offense of the gospel gone? Rolfe Barnard asks this interesting question that why the gospel has become so popular. The true gospel is foolish and scandal to the religious. It is a false gospel that does not transform and change men. The true gospel is a offense none other is the true gospel.

title: Paul, a Pattern of Conversion and Service
Preparing Your Heart to Receive the Truth
description: It is shared in this sermon that we need to take the time to prepare our hearts to receive the truth of God. The preparation is from God in proverbs, and yet it says sow to yourselves righteousness and break up your fallow ground. This sermon covers the need for people to have their hearts prepared to receive the truth to come into vital relationship with God.

title: Recovery of the Gospel
description: One of the most important needs of the day is the recovery of the true glorious gospel of the mighty God our Lord Jesus Christ. If sin is as deadly as the bible says it is and the devil as real as the bible says he is then to understand the true gospel of grace is the utmost need of our day. We are great sinners, sinning against a great God, that has offered us a great salvation.
